vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.13.22;
son of: Anak (H6061);
brother of: Sheshai (H8344) and Talmai (H8526)
§ Ahiman = "my brother is a gift"
1) a son of Anak
2) a Levite servant in the temple
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   gigante; descendiente de Anac; (b)   portero; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希幔 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是個禮物"
1) 亞衲之子
2) 在聖殿服事的一名利未人 (代上 9:17)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚希幔 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是个礼物"
1) 亚衲之子
2) 在圣殿服事的一名利未人 (代上 9:17)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.17
§ Ahiman = "my brother is a gift"
1) a son of Anak
2) a Levite servant in the temple
